name: Photobomb
description:
Hello, Media Peace Officer #A152013. As you know by now, a bomb was detonated in Tripathi Square only minutes ago. Our algorithms have been scraping social media to collect photos leading up to the event. We have narrowed the list of suspects to 6 in the vicinity who weren't wearing their ID trackers.

Scour the social media timeline and place the photos in the scene to paint the suspects. Determine the location of the bomb and identify the guilty suspect. Time is of the essence, #A152013.

The people want justice. You have 2 minutes.
